items.title: EGO’s modular Nexus power station with two 7.5Ah batteries can also refuel your arsenal at $899 (Reg. $1,099)
items.summary:
At Amazon, you can currently find the EGO Power+ Nexus Portable Power Station with two 7.5Ah batteries at $899 shipped. This bundled package usually runs for $1,099 without discounts, which we’ve mostly seen keeping down near $999 with discounts. While these drops to $899 are usually rare sightings, the price has been holding out strong since mid-August, with no telling how much longer it may last. Aside from the $838 low we saw once back during Black Friday, you’re otherwise looking at the best tracked price, which saves you $200 off the going rate. If you already have a collection of EGO ARC batteries, you can pick the station up on its own for $593.

items.title: JBL’s Flip 7 waterproof Bluetooth speaker with interchangeable accessories is back to $100 low
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on audio gear, Woot is now offering JBL’s Flip 7 portable Bluetooth speaker in blue for $99.95 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This model debuted back in April with a $150 price tag, and today’s deal knocks $50 off, bringing it back down to the lowest price we tracked before the recent Prime Day sale. Unlike last time, though, even the black and red variants are down to $100 low today, making this a great time to cash in and pick between a few color options. For comparison, Amazon still has it listed at the full $150, so be sure to jump in and lock in the discounted prices at Woot.

more…

Apple kicked off its “Awe Dropping” event with the introduction of the long-anticipated successor to the AirPods Pro 2, the AirPods Pro 3. items.title: At $84 shipped, this 40- by 24-inch electric standing desk packs a lot of value (Reg. $120)
items.summary:
Marsail 40- by 24-inch Electric Standing Desk

Buy for $84 (Reg. $120)

Clip the on-page 30% off coupon.

What we love

If you’re anything like me, you don’t want a massive desk taking up a ton of space. I think this one strikes a nice balance with a surface that spans 40 by 24 inches. Priced at $84 today, this is an offer that won’t break the bank and allows you to upgrade for only a minimal amount of money.

items.title: Spigen’s retro Mac-inspired Classic C1 Apple Watch charging stand falls to $15 in four colorways (25% off)
items.summary:
Spigen Classic C1 Apple Watch Charging Stand

Buy for $15 (Reg. $20)

What we love

It can be a blast having gear that stands out from the pack in a way that you like, and this Spigen Apple Watch charging mount is ready and waiting. It holds an Apple Watch charging puck and I think it nails the retro Mac-vibe here with this design. While the Bondi Blue model is my favorite, all four colorways are currently on sale for this price.

items.title: Arc’s next-gen aerospace-grade metal iPhone 17 bumper cases now available for purchase
items.summary:
Update: These new Arc Pulse iPhone 17 cases are now available for pre-order on the official site.

Arc – makers of arguably the most minimalist phone case on the market and the best bumper iPhone cases around – is ready to unleash its latest for iPhone 17. We are on the ground at Apple Park for today’s “Awe dropping” event, but before the show kicks off Arc is officially debuting the new Arc Pulse collection for iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. Pre-orders are live today on the official site and you can get a closer look down below.

items.title: MUJJO debuts new iPhone 17 leather cases with Camera Control and more from $39
items.summary:
MUJJO makes some of our favorite leather cases, especially when it comes to models outside of the usual brown and black. The brand certainly delivers the usuals, but you’ll also find a moody Bronze Red this year as well as the usual and incredibly vibrant Monaco Blue. The 2025 iPhone 17 lineup consists of its wonderful and more minimalist Full Leather Case as well as the Full Leather Wallet Case with a built-in pocket around back and the newer Tone Case. Get a closer look down below.
